subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, old Peyton Manning was the Peyton Manning of old. His joints didn’t creak and his passes weren’t all weak. He led the Broncos over the Patriots in a game to remember.
snippet: On Sunday, old Peyton Manning was the Peyton Manning of old. His joints didn’t creak and his passes weren’t all weak. He led the Broncos over the Patriots in a game to remember.
